title: 📘 Weekly Planning – June 16–22
content:
🧠 Priorities This Week
	•	Finalize IKEA influencer shortlist
	•	Launch Clara’s AI dashboard MVP
	•	Review new LoRA training outputs
	•	Send out June newsletter (draft due Wed)

⸻

🔍 Focus Areas

🔧 Project 1: AI Automation Dashboard

⚠️ Make sure Clara’s past Google Sheets are integrated for context-based filtering

	•	Upload historical campaign data (CSV format)
	•	Finalize influencer scoring rubric
	•	Integrate profile-matching prompt into backend
	•	User test internally by Friday

🎯 Project 2: Influencer Campaign – IKEA
	•	Filter IG profiles: men, 30+, Spain-based
	•	Prioritize value-for-money profiles
	•	Create tiered proposal deck (Top 10 + 10 backups)

⸻

🧰 Tools Used
	•	🔄 Make.com – Workflow automation
	•	📊 Google Sheets – Campaign data
	•	🧠 ChatGPT + Cursor – Prompt engineering
	•	📂 Supabase – Profile storage + query

⸻

💡 Ideas to Revisit


💭 Click to Expand


	•	Custom API to validate Instagram profile authenticity
	•	Visual graph of influencer past brand affinity
	•	Add Notion-style documentation within the app
	•	Reuse top-performing influencer templates in new markets





⸻

📅 Key Dates
	•	✅ June 17 (Mon): Internal stakeholder check-in
	•	📤 June 19 (Wed): Newsletter draft due
	•	🧪 June 21 (Fri): Internal MVP testing deadline
	•	📈 June 25 (Tue): IKEA proposal pitch

⸻

🗣️ Notes to Self


⸻
